Allows read-only access to the phone state, including the current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any PhoneAccounts registered on the device

Allows the application to read text messages
Allows the application to write to SMS messages stored on the device or SIM card, including y deleting messages
Allows the application to send SMS messages
Allows the application to open network sockets
Allows the application to write to external storage
Allows the application to read from external storage
Allows the application to receive a broadcast after the system finishes booting.
Allows the application to get information about current or recently run tasks
Allows the application to create windows shown on top of all other apps
Allows the application to access information about networks

Allows the application to use PowerManager WakeLocks to keep the processor from sleeping or the screen from dimming

continue to operate at full capacity while the phone's screen is turned off and the phone locked
